pages.text: $(thing)Foxes$() are a common, passive creature found across all the $(thing)Climate Zones$() of the $(thing)Misty World$(), where they hunt $(thing)Rabbits$().$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Fox$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be $(thing)Tamed$() and bred by feeding them $(item)Apples$(). Tame $(thing)Foxes$() will fight alongside their master.

pages.name: Fox
pages.drop1: mysticalworld:pelt{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-1", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill"]}}
